title: Duchess
name: Constance
description: A noblewoman turned monster, the Duchess is a formidable fencer who has embraced the Crimson Curse inflicted upon her by the Countess. She now seeks vengeance against the curse-inflicted court, particularly the Countess, while finding an uneasy alliance with the Heirs and fighters of the Hamlet.
history: Born into nobility, Constance lived a life of luxury and became the court's finest fencer. She developed a rivalry with the Countess, who later disappeared for years. Upon receiving an invitation to a party in the Ancestor's courtyard along with a chalice of blood, Constance became infected with the Crimson Curse. Now transformed, she seeks revenge against the Baron, the Viscount, and especially the Countess.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Large, angular helmet that hides everything but her toothy mouth
clothing.legs: Tattered dress reinforced with metal plates

notes: Maintains an aristocratic air, insisting on comforts befitting her station
Treats her hunger with dark humor, often joking about eating her allies
Speaks with with sardonic wit and cutting remarks
Views her human allies as temporary tools in her vendetta
